Title: LOL
Plot: Bill asks Hank to step in as a guest speaker at Mia's creative writing class. During a radio interview, Hank talks about his writing and motivations. Meanwhile, Becca develops a crush on her guitar teacher Dave, but he ends up with Mia.
ParentalRatingReason: R16 Offensive language,drug use and sexual content that may offend
GuestStars: Lance Barber, Henry Rollins, Camille Langfield, Amy Price-Francis, Jaoquin Pastor, Amy Okuda
